urls.title: Who invented the airplane tray table? | Air Dolomiti Blog
urls.description: The tray table is one of your best allies on board. But who invented it? On AirDolomitiBlog

data.text:
#AirDolomitiBlog
Whether you put it down to eat a snack, finish a presentation on your laptop or play Sudoku, the tray table is one of your best allies on board 💺
But who invented it? 💡👉 https://t.co/HnZbxPbbRP https://t.co/22oyvsZV85

This weekend, we wanted to make Piazza Bra (Verona) sparkle even more resplendently 💚
We joined forces with @plasticfreeit to spruce up the city 🚮
It was a new opportunity for us to create a team spirit while doing something positive for the environment that surrounds us 🌍 https://t.co/iTXQQtCFdD

At the Festivaletteratura in Mantua we had the pleasure of sponsoring the 'Reinventing the city' project.
The protagonists were children 🤸 who, through play, experimented with a sense of community and green space living by building a big playground using recycled materials. https://t.co/STZ3Nn41Np

#SpazioItaliaBar https://t.co/nDROGIQivP

data.text:
Do you know what the 'water cannon' or 'water arch' is? 💦
It's a cerimonial salute for celebrating milestones such as the inauguration of a new route or the last flight of a type of aircraft.
Have you ever been a passenger on board during one of this special events? 😍
#AdAstra https://t.co/bMFLkNiK0a

This year we decided to support @Fondoambiente by joining the Corporate Golden Donor membership programme. 
Alongside the FAI, we want to carry out a major project that is also an ambitious cultural challenge: to make Italy a better place to live, work and raise our children in💚 https://t.co/k7FeV80vnz

urls.title: PRIDE! THERE’S A TOUCH OF TURQUOISE IN THE RAINBOW TOO | Air Dolomiti Blog
urls.description: The original rainbow flag was created by US artist and activist Gilbert Baker, who died in March 2017 in New York.

data.text:
What are the hidden meanings behind the colours of the rainbow flag? Write your favourite colour in the comments!
...ours is TURQUOISE! 💙
Read more on our #AirDolomitiBlog 👉 https://t.co/BXLl9Poi2P https://t.co/ilPrnHB2nQ

✨ The magic of watching an opera under a star-filled sky has made this summer truly unforgettable. 
Singing, music, history, dance and costumes 🎭 are the protagonists this season.
You can experience an enchanting performance until 4 September 😍 
#inArena @arenadiverona https://t.co/aDtAFYFoqk

Today is World Photography Day 📸 and we all have a habit of taking pictures of the same subjects.
What do you like to capture on camera most? Let us know! 😉
As you've probably noticed, we can't get enough of this incredible view ✈️💙 
#AdAstra

ph. credits @gabriel_tacconi https://t.co/uZT9p4ybtm

data.text:

Find out more 👉 https://t.co/8KKvyGnNam

data.text: ✈️ #AirDolomitiBlog Before airplanes, helicopters, airships, hot-air balloons and hang-gliders, human flight was nothing but a pipe dream. But not for Leonardo Da Vinci, the genius who made everything possible 👉 https://t.co/M1vg11S2EO https://t.co/2IoghF2awU

data.text:
The Verona Arena is a unique and prestigious venue.
Have you ever wondered how much work goes into staging each show? In this issue of #SpazioItaliaMagazine we reveal what it takes to produce the perfect performance and create a truly magical atmosphere 👉https://t.co/v5zD9dfSpN https://t.co/gqDaos6NEF
Dear @denisevasi , we are sorry for the inconvenience. As per the conversation on Instagram we are already managing your file through our competent office. Thanks for understanding
Hi @imwritingwrongs ! Please note that in these cases we always assist all of our passengers via private messages due to privacy reasons. Thank you

Today is World Social Media Day! 😛
Firstly, a very warm thank you to all followers who engage with all our Lufthansa Group channels. But also a thank you to all our social media units 💙 who provide daily updates, information and insights into our company with great dedication. https://t.co/iLEWrkdBFZ

urls.description: A complete travel guide to the main attractions of Turin, in Italy. Discover what to do, what to see and where to eat in Turin on Air Dolomiti website. data.text:

Book your flight now and don’t forget to tag us in your holiday snaps 📸👉 https://t.co/DGUBATFzfn
#Turin #AirDolomiti https://t.co/vkttkucpvI

When leaving the plane, always check the seat pocket in front of you – and the seat next to you 😉 – to make sure you haven’t left anything behind!
Has that ever happened to you? What did you lose and where were you travelling to? Let us know in the comments! ✏️
#AirDolomiti https://t.co/d8CI5ohzmx

data.text: Ciao @nelsonlariccia ! 😊 Grazie mille!! ✈️

📅 On 1 June 1992, our first flight Munich-Venice-Munich touched down in a Dash 8-300 aircraft. 
We wanted to celebrate the 30th anniversary milestone of this route together with you, our passengers 💙
Were any of you there on that day? 😄
#AdAstra
@MUC_Airport / #veneziaairport https://t.co/RPgU41xHdm

Today is International Flight Attendant Day ✈️
Take a trip around the world with staff from all the airlines of the Lufthansa Group – watch the video! 💙

#InternationalFlightAttendantDay #FlightAttendant #AirDolomiti #AdAstra #LufthansaGroup https://t.co/tztz9d2Vq0

a thought that changes your day 🍬

Starting today, this stunning region is even easier to get to! ✈️
We’ve just landed in Brindisi, the first of many touchdowns in wonderful Puglia ☀️

#AdAstra #Settimocielo #oncloudnine https://t.co/DkfzzsYP5s

This weekend, allow yourself to be swept away by the magic of this beautiful castle 🏰 and book your next trip to Kalmar!
Who wouldn't want to enjoy a spectacular sunset like this one?! ✨ https://t.co/FzKqH8rYMC

ph. credits @dragon_photographer https://t.co/MtVzo6D23m

data.text:
Dive into Puglia’s hot-blooded regional capital for a day to remember!
Get down with the fishermen at the portside market before strolling the labyrinthine lanes of Bari Vecchia 💙
Puglia is waiting for you 👉 https://t.co/gAr94kss5f
#WeAreInPuglia

📸 Joe Vitone / @WeAreInPuglia https://t.co/FVr2rtprtH

data.text:
With so many delicious options to choose from at our #SpazioItaliaBar, why not download the menu 🔝 before your departure so you can browse at your leisure!
Then you can simply relax on board and say: "I'd like this 🍤 and this 🍰, and also this 🍷 ...?"
👉https://t.co/8KKvyGnNam https://t.co/75G0tDzxuk

We are donating 1,878 travel kits containing blankets, pillows and other accessories to the people in Ukraine.
Our employees have also been making various kinds of donations, including food, toiletries and medicine.
 
Our sincere thanks to everyone who has participated.
🙏 https://t.co/UonN1mP2xz

data.text:
Our CEO, Steffen Harbarth, wanted to meet 🤝 our Flight Academy trainees for the first time. 
They talked about a variety of topics, but one clear ambition was shared by everyone: the hope of a future with wings! ✈️

#AdAstra #WeAreAirDolomiti https://t.co/e15rF9VOHo

On the #AirDolomitiBlog, we pay tribute to an Italian flight #pioneer, who unfortunately had to deal with a lot of prejudice, but whose tenacity and #courage were an inspiration 👉 https://t.co/q3oEvEzafP https://t.co/gLuFvYp4kF
